meanings.definition: The quality of being fashionable or trendy.
meanings.sent1: Her voguishness in clothing always catches everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The voguishness of that new hairstyle is spreading quickly among teenagers.
meanings.sent3: Despite his attempt to hide it, his voguishness in fashion was quite evident.
meanings.sent4: Her voguishness shone like a beacon in the sea of outdated styles.
meanings.sent5: The voguishness of her outfit was so striking that it became the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: The state of being in vogue or popular.
meanings.sent1: The voguishness of the trend was undeniable as it appeared on every social media platform.
meanings.sent2: Being in the spotlight increased her voguishness among her peers.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to imitate the voguishness of the celebrity ended in a hilarious fashion mishap.
meanings.sent4: The voguishness of the song resonated with listeners on a deep emotional level.
meanings.sent5: The voguishness of the new gadget made it a must-have item for tech enthusiasts.
